overview: Mr. Fiddler has twenty-five plus years of diversified financial and operational experience. He is responsible for providing financial metrics and guidance to facilitate best business decisions company-wide, while providing essential corporate support. Prior to joining STI, he was the CFO and Controller for eMag Solutions LLC, an electronic discovery and software company. Mr. Fiddler has twenty years of audit experience including time with a Big 4 accounting firm. He earned his Bachelor of Science degree in Accounting from Ball State University and graduated with Magna Cum Laude distinction.
